availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Casey County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Resident of Casey County, Kentucky in 1850. Served as a private in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from September 1862 to September 1863. Served as a private in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from December 1863 to January 1865. Served as a private in the Casey County State Guard Company from February to October 1865. Court martialed for desertion in April 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 821.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey, District 2, p. 292B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Rolls 0124, 0089, 0502.
KYR-0003-101-0015.
